name: Little Wars (emircanisanc)
description:
After the game loaded you can start by pressing the button. 

UPGRADES

1 - Gain 50 health and upgrade your market. (Upgraded soldiers are more stronger and more expensive)

CONTROLLERS

A - D keys to movement.

Click UI elements to buy soldier or upgrade your castle.

ASSETS

Assets from Goldmetal - Asset Store (unity.com)
